channel.title: Need beta testers for a Desktop AIO
channel.description:
After years of having a clutered desktop and not knowing were my programs are, I have decided to write a program to fix all of that. This program (called DeskTop-X) will do tasks like pull up AIM or iTunes, or open webpages. It can also be programed to run private servers with an auto restarter! This all available through a friendly GUI and the best part is... (drum roll!) Its free! Unlike Object Desktop, I won't charge you $40.00 for the program. Also, it will have more features and will be able to flip your world more than Vista...
So what are you waiting for!? Become a BETA tester today and experience the extreme!
RXVL
Staff list:
~Coders~ Me
~BETA testers~ Me MybJames Falko222 therealjdb
Side note: BETA testers get a better version than the free one :)

item.title: Need beta testers for a Desktop AIO
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Extract it and open it. Simple as pie. Its based off of Windows and is easy to navigate. If you don’t have the latest flash, get it at www.abobe.com

EDIT: Ok, heres what I did tonight:

Added all Nav Bar Buttons (X, Down, etc.)
Added the Program Bar at the bottom
Created a blank start menu
Removed the main text and replaced it with spinning text

EDIT2: Heres the downloadable version: [br][size=1]Posted on: March 05, 2007, 09:48:40 PM[/size][hr]Sorry for double post… Anyone else wanna beta it?

Read full topic

item.title: Need beta testers for a Desktop AIO
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Me? Lol, heres another beta! Don’t forget to check out all the Buttons on the top (X, down arrow, up arrow, 4 arrows).

X = Close
Down Arrow = Exit full screen
Up Arrow = Enter full screen
4 Arrows = Move Buttons (click to start, click again to end)

Read full topic
